snippet.title: NEO Scavenger Gameplay Trailer - Aug 2012
snippet.description:
Play NEO Scavenger at http://bluebottlegames.com

In NEO Scavenger, you must survive in the wasteland long enough to figure out who you are. Each turn you must decide where to go, how to scavenge for supplies, and how to deal with anything and anyone you encounter. And with each passing minute, the pit in your stomach grows, your dehydration worsens, your muscles tire, and your body temperature drops in the cold autumn air. Choose your starting abilities carefully, because they and your wit are the only tools you have in the apocalypse!
